collection:
This Privacy Policy explains
how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information and the steps we
take to protect it.

By using the Services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy and
consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as
described herein.

Information We Collect

We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you
use the Services, including but not limited to your name, email address, and
any prompts or other content you submit.

We also automatically collect certain
technical information about your device, such as your IP address, browser
type, and other similar information, for the purpose of providing and
improving the Services.
sharing:
This Privacy Policy explains
how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information and the steps we
take to protect it.

By using the Services, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy and
consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as
described herein.

Disclosure of Information

We may disclose your personal information to:

a.

Third-party service providers who assist us in providing the Services,
including the OpenAI, Hubble.ai, which powers the Services.

Law enforcement or government
authorities if required by law or to protect the rights, property, or safety
of GetSmartGPT.com, our users, or others.

c. A third party in connection with
a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets.
